Maps.Name: Shadows Of Evil
Maps.Description: The First Black Ops 3 Map. Information about shield part locations, PackAPunch Guide and a tool for the Sword Step.

ShieldParts.ImageDescription: The first location can be found in the hotel, leaning on the window opposite the perk machine.
The second location can be found on the left side of the walkway, outside the hotel containing the perk machine.
The third location can be found in the first room next to the stairs that have to be powered on whilst in the 'Beast Mode'.
This first location can be found sitting right next to the perk machine.
This second location can be found in the enclosure leading upstairs.
The third location can be found across from the perk machine, leaning against a rail.
This first possible location is on the floor in the room connected to the perk room.
This second location is the walkway leading from the Beast Mode shortcut to the perk room. If here, it will be leaning against the crate.
Finally, the bottles could be in the same room as the perk machine, against the wall by the window that is across from said perk machine.

This shield can be upgraded into the Goddard Apparatus, which sustains more damage and has four bursts instead of three. To obtain it, one must kill 10 or more zombies with 12 consecutive bursts with the Rocket Shield.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step One
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: While in 'Beast Mode' zap the crane. Leave beast mode and collect the fountain pen that is dropped.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Two
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Go to Niro's Lair and survive the ritual.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Three
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Collect the Gateworm.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Four
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: While in 'Beast Mode' melee the box up on the ledge across from the perk machine.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Five
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Leave 'Beast Mode' and collect the Hair Piece.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Six
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Go to the nightclub and survive the ritual.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Seven
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Collect the Gateworm. A margwa will spawn on the second Gateworm pickup.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Eight
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: While in 'Beast Mode', melee the box up on the ledge.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Nine
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Leave 'Beast Mode' and collect the wrestling belt.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Ten
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Go to the boxing ring and survive the ritual.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Eleven
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Collect the Gateworm.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Twelve
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: While in 'Beast Mode', zap the box in the wall in the canal.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Thirteen
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: While in 'Beast Mode', melee the box in the canal. Leave 'Beast Mode' and collect the badge.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Fourteen
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Go to the top of the 'Ruby Rabbit' and survive the ritual.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Fifteen
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Collect the Gateworm. A margwa will spawn on the Fourth Gateworm pickup.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Sixteen
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Go through a teleporter to the underground room

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Seventeen
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Go to the back of the room and wait for the wall to be destroyed.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Eighteen
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Place a gateworm in all of the bird bath type statues. Wall run across the walls to get to the other side.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Nineteen
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Begin the final ritual

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Twenty
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: PackAPunch can now be used.

Maps.Name: The Giant
Maps.Description: The Second Black Ops 3 Map. PackAPunch Guide.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step One
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: To activate PackAPunch all 3 telporters need to be activated.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Two
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Use the first teleporter located at the back of the map. You have 30 seconds to get back to spawn.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Three
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Interact with the teleport pad at spawn.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Four
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Use the second teleporter located at the right side of the map. You have 30 seconds to get back to spawn and interact with the teleport pad.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Five
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Use the final teleporter located at the left side of the map. You have 30 seconds to get back to spawn and interact with the teleport pad.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Six
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: The door in front of PackAPunch will now be opened.

Maps.Name: Der Eisendrache
Maps.Description: The Third Black Ops 3 Map. Information about shield part locations, PackAPunch Guide, Ragnarok part locations, wisp locations and a tool for the Simon Says and Safe Step.

ShieldParts.ImageDescription: The first location can be found on the boxes on the left, after the gate door.
The second location can be found by the window on the boxes.
The third location can be found up the stairs next to the door that can only be opened by turning on the power.
The first location can be found on the right outside of the command center room
The second location can be found at the bottom of the stairs, near the clock tower.
The third location can be found in the clock tower next to the deceased zombie in the chair.
The first location can be found on the outside of the golden rails on the ceiling of the anti gravity room. (Anti Gravity must been enabled)
The second location can be found on the wall above the packapunch teleport pad. (Anti Gravity must been enabled)
The third location can be found above the door of the teleporter room.(Anti Gravity must been enabled)

This shield can be upgraded into the Goddard Apparatus, which sustains more damage and has four bursts instead of three. To obtain it, one must kill 10 or more zombies with 12 consecutive bursts with the Rocket Shield.

WonderWeaponParts.ImageDescription: Feed each dragon around the map. The first Dragon is located after the gate door, next to a mystery box location.
The second dragon is at the back of the command center room.
The third dragon is in the anti gravity room.
The bow can be picked up behind the knight. The bow can be upgraded itno 4 different elemental types, see the individual upgrades on the previous page for full guides on how to upgrade.

SecondaryParts.ImageDescription: Go to the rocket launchpad and wait for a testfire launch.
Interact with the lever and return to inside to the teleporter pad.
Wait for all three lights to go green and the lever to flip up. Interact with the lever.
4. The part will spawn in the teleporter.
1. Active the death ray and a piece will spawn in the air.
2. Use the launch pad to collect the part in the air.
Kill the first panzer of the map (One spawns on round 12)
The Ragnarok DG-4 cannot be upgraded.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step One
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Start by turning on the power.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Two
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Teleport the PackAPunch pieces located next to the death ray, just outside of the power room.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Three
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Teleport the PackAPunch pieces located in the undercroft (across from the teleporter room)

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Four
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Walk up to the final pieces and the PackAPunch machine will assemble itself

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Five
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: The PackAPunch will be ready for use. It's worth noting that the PackAPunch Machine will move randomly between the 3 locations.

WispSteps.ImageDescription: The first location can be found on the clock in the Barracks.
The second location can be found on the radio in the Command Center, opposite Speed Cola.
The third location can be found on the clock in the Command Center.
The fourth location can be found on the wall in power room, just before the exit to the death ray.
The fifth location can be found on the globe in Samanthas room.
The sixth location can be found on the boxes on the catwalk above Double Tap.
The seventh location can be found on the Car wheel, next to Double Tap.
The eight location can be found on the desk opposite Quick Revive.

Maps.Name: Zetsubou No Shima
Maps.Description: The Fourth Black Ops 3 Map. Information about shield part locations, gas mask locations, PackAPunch guide and KT-4 Guide.

ShieldParts.ImageDescription: The first location can be found on the wall next to the blue light.
The second location can be found on the wall next to the yellow illuminated window.
The third location can be found on the pillar with kuda wall buy on the right side of it.
The first location can be found on a tree out the front of the entrance to Lab B.
The second location can be found on a tree at the bottom of the hill up to the main bunker.
The third location can be found on a tree below the drop down from the skull area/challenge podiums.
The first location can be found in the back left corner of the AA gun room in the main bunker.
The second location can be found in the back right corner of the AA gun room in the main bunker, on some rubble.
The third location can be found in the near right corner of the AA gun room in the main bunker, on some rubble.
Complete all player(s) challenges.
Wait for lightning to hit.
Equip the shield while stood in the lightning, the shield will now be upgraded.

WonderWeaponParts.ImageDescription: Get the first part located at the very back of the map, deep in the underwater section.
Lower the cage from one of the Labs.
Lure a spider into the cage and raise the cage.
Collect the part from the syringe.
This part randomly spawns on a zombie. Kill the zombie and pick up the part that it drops.
Build the KT-4 in the workbench at the back of the main bunker.
The KT-4 can now be equipped. Other players will now be able to recieve it from the box too.

SecondaryParts.ImageDescription: The first location can be found on some boxes near the green water at Lab B.
The second location can be found next to the green water at Lab B.
The third location can be found in the sideways open crate in front of the perk machine, up the metal stairs outside Lab B.
The first location can be found hanging at the back of the crashed plane.
The second location can be found hanging at the front of the crashed plane.
The third location can be found on the rock, to the left of the mystery box spawn location.
The first location can be found on the crate next to the skull alter.
The second location can be found on the crate next to the pier.
The third location can be found on the rock next to the VMP wall buy.
The Gas Mask cannot be upgraded.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step One
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Obtain a bucket.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Two
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Fill the bucket with water.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Three
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Turn on the power in both Labs. This will open up the main bunker.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Four
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Take the left door at the PackAPunch machine and survive the under water hold off. You'll then be able to turn on the power.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Five
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Pick up the part that dropped while in the under water hold off.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Six
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Next take the door behind PackAPunch, and go down the flooded tunnel. The part will be on the floor within the tunnel.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Seven
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Next take the door to the right of PackAPunch. Knife all the body bags until the part drops.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Eight
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Interact with each of the pipes surrounding PackAPunch.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Nine
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: PackAPunch will now be opened up.

Maps.Name: Gorod Krovi
Maps.Description: The Fifth Black Ops 3 Map. Information about shield part locations, PackAPunch Guide, a tool for the bomb step and valve step.

ShieldParts.ImageDescription: This part can be found on the chair next across from Juggernog perk machine.
The next location can be found on the truck door just down the stairs from the Juggernog perk machine.
The final location can be found on the shelf on the left as you enter the Operations Bunker.
The first location can be found in between the boxes up the infirmary stairs from the Operations Bunker.
The next location can be found on the bottom bunkbed situated next to the stairs.
The final location can be found across from the staminup perk.
The first location can be found resting on some boxes in the top of the armory across from the valve.
The next location can be found resting on the wall next to the walkway into Supply Depot.
The final location can be found resting on the wall next to the wunderfizz machine in the bottom of Armory.
Get 30-50 kills kills with the shield.
Go to Supply Depot and shoot the writing in the roof with the shield.
Go to Dragon Command and shoot the writing on the wall to the left of the dragon boarding area with the shield.
Go to Tank Factory and shoot the writing on the robot to the right of the dragon boarding area with the shield.
Survive with the shield out in fire for 30-60 seconds..
Place the shield in the Dead Dragons Corpse.
Tiamat's Maw has more durability and has a stronger attack.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step One
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Turn power on.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Two
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Wait for a zombie to drop a code cylinder.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Three
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Take the cylinder to the stated location.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Four
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Call in a groph module. This will randomly drop somwehere on the map (look for the green light).

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Five
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Kill the zombies before the groph module is destroyed.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Six
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Once the groph module is charged, the network circuit part will be available to pick up.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Seven
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Repeat steps 2 - 6 two more times and take the 3 parts to the operations bunker computer.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Eight
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Call a dragon in from one of the platforms.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Nine
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: Ride the dragon until you are kicked off.

Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageLabel: Activating Pack a Punch - Step Ten
Pack-A-PunchSteps.ImageDescription: PackAPunch will be on the ground floor.
